short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hyper Tiler allows you to open links in new windows spaced evenly around your monitor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select your monitor resolution along with how many rows and columns of windows you would like.  Hyper Tiler does all the calculations for you!  Right click on any link, go to Hyper Tiler in the menu and select which spot you want the new link to open in.  Quickly & easily close all windows that were opened with Hyper Tiler with shortcut key Ctrl+Shift+Z on windows and Cmd+Shift+Z on mac or from the menu.
